overview: A young man worries about his possible death; a girl plays with leftover Christmas fireworks; another young man tries to film a short film and is met with the honest rejection of his friends; a girl finds fleeting moments to read and a pianist tirelessly prepares a piece of music, oblivious to the world that is still spinning outside. A day and a night: enough time for countless events to unfold, here are some of them. What we see is a daily dispersion, a collection of situations and characters that meet and separate.
title: Mientras Bode toca el piano
